name: Jared Marquez
body:
# Jared Marquez
	
 * Email: <smoe79@gmail.com>

## Objective

To apply my skills and education in the development of software with a focus on game development. 

## Education

######Bachelors of Science, Computer Science with Focus in Software Development, May 2015
Georgia Gwinnett College, Lawrenceville, Georgia

* Central Focus is in the development and improvement of custom software.
* Heavy emphasis on both individual and team development structures.
* Experience with documentation, version control, and scheduling.
* Experience with testing, debugging, and designing to user needs.

##Projects

###### Unity Engine Game Developer, GGC Game Development Class

* Developed Text Based, 2D, and 3D games using the Unity Engine
* Created scripts for networked games using C# and JavaScript
* Experience with creating and importing 3D models from Blender to Unity
* Connected animation files with 3D models and player inputs
* Managed sound design and placement within 3D and 2D environments

###### Android Application Designer and Developer for GGC Connect, GGC Software Development Class

* Designed the functions of the "Class Scheduler" sections of app
* Developed application UI using XML
* Worked with a small team to publish and advertise application with school community
* Created presentations to display and demo application to small, rotating groups
       
##Skills

* Languages: C#, C++, Java, JavaScript
* Development Skills: Project scope, Gantt charts, Development Pipelines
* Other Skills: Fluently spoken in Spanish, Experienced with the Microsoft Office Suite



*References on request.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
